data.message: Facebook, I am having an issue where a limit or posting has been blocked, and I need to resolve it. Can someone please contact me about this so I can get resolved?

replies.message: Hi Kyle. Limits are based on different factors, like speed and quantity, but we can't provide additional details on the rate limits that are enforced. If you're blocked from using a feature, you can learn more about feature blocks here: http://bit.ly/2rfJLEE. -Jessica

Okay. Perfect. I was posting for a Go Fund Me for my puppies leg. Surgery is very expensive and was just trying to get the word out there. Is there anyway to "unblock" this, and I will just limit to my page only?
Hi Jessica. I commented on here a few hours ago, but never recieved a response from anyone there at Facebook.
Hi Jason. If you see a Facebook charge on your bank statement that you don't recognize, please report it to us by filling out this form: http://bit.ly/2pViFii. -Jessica

Yes. I have already filled one of those out yesterday. What I wanted to know is how can I find out the status as well as turnaround time. I would like some idea when I can expect to get my money returned to my bank account.

Facebook.. I need help... Please help.. My account is not disabled.. I cant get into my account settings or support inbox or anything technical. I cant post status updates but i can post pictures. Please help..
